description: Prairies Economic Development Canada (PrairiesCan) is seeking the services of a Business Process Consultant to conduct an objective and in-depth review of the effectiveness and efficiency of PrairiesCan’s delivery model (G&Cs delivery, policy, and financial management), and the associated processes, systems, and functions.
full_summary:
TSPS (Solutions) - Stream 2 - Business Consulting
==============================

### Tender Details

*   **Tender Title**: TSPS (Solutions) - Stream 2 - Business Consulting
*   **Reference Number**: cb-5989-91780752
*   **Solicitation Number**: 4W002-240033
*   **Publication Date**: 2023-06-01
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-07-10T17:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-07-17
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-03-29
*   **Present State**: Expired

### Key Information

*   **UNSPSC Code**: 80101500
*   **UNSPSC Description**: Business and Corporate Management Consultation Services
*   **Procurement Category**: SRV
*   **Method of Procurement**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
*   **Trade Agreements Involved**:  Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
*   **Regions of Delivery**: Saskatchewan, Manitoba, Alberta

### Tender Description

Prairies Economic Development Canada is seeking the services of a Business Process Consultant to conduct an objective and in-depth review of the effectiveness and efficiency of the department's delivery model, associated processes, systems, and functions. The consultant will assess the alignment of various business functions at the corporate and regional levels to ensure that the department’s programs and services are delivered effectively.

### Contact Information

*   **Contact Name**: Ryan Bent
*   **Contact Email**: [ryan.bent@prairiescan.gc.ca](mailto:ryan.bent@prairiescan.gc.ca)
*   **Phone Number**: 403-921-7545
*   **Address**: Suite 1500, Canada Place, Edmonton, Alberta, T5J 4H7
*   **Additional Attachments**: [Not applicable](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5989/npp-4w002-240033_en.pdf) (\[English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca
